net.tfobz.vocabletrainer.gui.panels

Class VocableTrainerInfoPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • net.tfobz.vocabletrainer.gui.panels.VocableTrainerPanel
              • net.tfobz.vocabletrainer.gui.panels.VocableTrainerInfoPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class VocableTrainerInfoPanel
extends VocableTrainerPanel
    VocableTrainerInfoPanel is a GUI panel that displays and manages vocabulary sets within the Vocable Trainer application. It allows users to view, rename, and delete vocabulary sets and individual vocabulary cards.
    See Also:
    VocableTrainerPanel, VocableTrainerFrame, Serialized Form
